Ebbro 43112 Toyota Supra (A80) 2000 JGTC Series GT500 Class 9th Place H. Noda/W. Gardner

Purchased: 2014

I love the livery on this one. Thanks go to Rat for brining it to my attention a few month back. As Matt pointed out in my acquisitions thread Wayne Gardner was also known as "Captain Chaos" since he was one of the most crash-prone drivers in the Australian V8 Supercars series. Maybe he needed to adjust to a larger vehicle as he had raced motorcycles from 1983 - 1992. :lol:
